title: Lake Ouch! 1981
description:
Ouch! is the fourth studio album by Lake, released in 1980 in Germany and 1981 in the USA. 

It is the first album to be released following the departure of three members of the band from their peak period, Detlef Petersen, Geoffrey Peacey, and Martin Tiefense, who were replaced by Frank Hieber, Achim Opperman, and Heiko Efferz.

This sound track was converted from .APE audio format to MP3 format @ 128kbps using freeware Super audio converter.

The original .APE/Cue files are included in a separate folder of this package.

The single Mp3 track which was created by Super was then divided into 9 separate tracks at a bit rate of 128kbps each using Roxio's Sound Editor.

The original un-split MP3 track of the whole album is included with the separate tracks.

Enjoy!
